comments.content:
Congratulations.. Lovely..   
_Let me be the first Typophile to congratulate.._   
   
_So, this, officially, may be, Typophiles 'typographic babies month', then.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)_   
   
All the best, for the whole family..

Congratulations, John!   
   
So, will 'FF Rosemary' (which you are likely to design within the next couple of years) be a serif or a sans serif?   
   
--   
Soren O

Congratulations, John!   
   
So, will 'FF Rosemary' (which you are likely to design within the next couple of years) be a serif or a sans serif?   
   
--   
Soren O

What a splendid beauty!!! Best of health and happiness to youand your family!   
   
ChrisL

To all of you NEW fathers on Fathers Day: SAVE MONEY FOR COLLEGE NOW (while you can)   
:-)
Culturally-appropriate drinks all round! Congratulations on another new arrival into the world.

Thanks, everyone... it was an incredible experience. Little Rosie is exceedingly healthy and happy, and is coming home today at 10am...   
   
 ![footsies](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/38797.jpg)
a bit late, but concratulation, john.

John, I asked you if 'FF Rosemary' would be a serif or a sans serif. Your second photo answered the question ;-)   
   
--   
Soren O

John,   
   
Another reason to quit smoking. Cute kid, I am worried about you John. Kids need their dad butt out, cough, cough, and stick around.   
   
The best to all of you.
